review_data.title: Dark, damp and not delicious!
review_data.content: We ate at the zoo outside the cafe by the Mora Mora bar ‘in the jungle’? Neither the service nor the food was very good.

review_data.title: By making a visit to the Zürich ZOO, i`m convinced that you need a rest within the ZOO fasilities
review_data.content: By making a visit to the Zürich ZOO, I’m convinced that you need a rest within the ZOO facilities. Especially together with your children, family or friends. Myside, I can tell you it is fine there.

review_data.title: Tasty Sandwich
review_data.content: I missed the lunch due to travelling but the sandwich I had from this restaurant was great in size, very tasty and filling. It is a right place to relax and have snacks and drinks after the long walk at the zoo ever before visiting...More

review_data.title: Good pitstop for resting

review_data.title: A great place for a late breakfast on a Sunday morning

review_data.title: Bonne table à la sortie du zoo

review_data.title: excellent

review_data.title: Good Food and Fast Service
review_data.content: After plenty of walk in Zurich Zoo, it is good place to stop for nice meal at Zurich Zoo. Meals are nice and healthy and service is quick.

review_data.title: Ist OK

review_data.title: Good fast meal
review_data.content: I had lunch after visiting the Zoo, and I was not disappointed at all. It serves fast meals, but it is not a fast food. It has some salads, soups and pastas. The bread is really good!

review_data.title: Достойное место

review_data.title: Heathy food in a nice environment

review_data.title: muito show de bola

review_data.title: Вкусно

review_data.title: qualidade, sabor e bom gosto
review_data.content: Restaurante muito simpático, com um ambiente muito aconchegante e sofisticado. Comida de alta qualidade e boas opções de bebidas
